addPhrase.description: Add a p5.Phrase to this Part.

getBPM.description: Returns the Beats Per Minute of this currently part.

getPhrase.description: Get a phrase from this part, based on the name it was given when it was created. Now you can modify its array.

loop.description: Loop playback of this part. It will begin looping through all of its phrases at a speed determined by setBPM.

noLoop.description: Tell the part to stop looping.

onStep.description: Fire a callback function at every step.

pause.description: Pause the part. Playback will resume from the current step.

removePhrase.description: Remove a phrase from this part, based on the name it was given when it was created.

replaceSequence.description: Get a phrase from this part, based on the name it was given when it was created. Now you can modify its array.

setBPM.description: Set the tempo of this part, in Beats Per Minute.

start.description: Start playback of this part. It will play through all of its phrases at a speed determined by setBPM.

stop.description: Stop the part and cue it to step 0.
